data.name: A Hole New World - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
COMIC

Comic of A HOLE NEW WORLD (in PDF, JPG and CBZ formats). Cover art and 8 pages made by Juanito Medina (Loloxomoxo).


Once downloaded, the Comic can be found in the A Hole New World Steam directory.
...\Steam\steamapps\common\A Hole New World\A Hole New World Comic

*In your Steam library, you can right click on the game, then click on properties, then on "local files" tab and finally on "Browse local files" to show the directory.

SOUNDTRACK

Soundtrack of A HOLE NEW WORLD, in "320kbps MP3's" format. A total of 48 tracks, both in 8-Bit and 16-Bit flavour, for over 48 minutes of music by Daniel Pellicer.


Also you can listen to it using the Sound Test from within the game... but you know you want it in MP3 format! ;D

Once downloaded, MP3 files can be found in the A Hole New World Steam directory as well as played from within the Steam Music Player!
...\Steam\steamapps\common\A Hole New World\A Hole New World 8-bit Soundtrack
...\Steam\steamapps\common\A Hole New World\A Hole New World 16-bit Soundtrack

*In your Steam library, you can right click on the game, then click on properties, then on "local files" tab and finally on "Browse local files" to show the directory.

Tracklist:
A Hole New World 8-bit Soundtrack
01 - The Creation of the Two Worlds (1:08)
02 - Press Start (0:54)
03 - The Hero Appears (0:32)
04 - A Very Big Fire (1:51)
05 - The Enemy Appears (0:58)
06 - Boss Fight (1:40)
07 - Map B (0:13)
08 - Forest Theme (1:59)
09 - Map C (0:09)
10 - Warm Falling Snow (1:57)
11 - Map D (0:07)
12 - Dancing Blood (1:56)
13 - Dh'raza (2:14)
14 - Map E (0:08)
15 - Bloody Sign Samurai (3:10)
16 - Prius Castle (2:17)
17 - Prius (2:18)
18 - Lord Baduk (3:34)
19 - Let's do this Fäy (4:18)
20 - Ending Theme (1:09)
21 - Hero Credits (3:06)
22 - Map A (0:06)
23 - Weapon Obtained (0:16)
24 - I can't revive you anymore... (1:00)

A Hole New World 16-bit Soundtrack
01 - The Creation of the Two Worlds (1:08)
02 - Press Start (0:54)
03 - The Hero Appears (0:32)
04 - A Very Big Fire (1:51)
05 - The Enemy Appears (0:57)
06 - Boss Fight (1:40)
07 - Map B (0:07)
08 - Forest Theme (2:01)
09 - Map C (0:13)
10 - Warm Falling Snow (1:56)
11 - Map D (0:07)
12 - Dancing Blood (1:57)
13 - Dh'raza (2:17)
14 - Map E (0:06)
15 - Bloody Sign Samurai (3:10)
16 - Prius Castle (2:14)
17 - Prius (2:28)
18 - Lord Baduk (3:35)
19 - Let's do this Fäy (9:18)
20 - Ending Theme (1:03)
21 - Hero Credits (3:09)
22 - Map A (0:04)
23 - Weapon Obtained (0:32)
24 - I can't revive you anymore... (1:01)

data.short_description: It's the Soundtrack of A HOLE NEW WORLD, in "320kbps MP3's" format. A total of 48 tracks, both in 8-Bit and 16-Bit flavour, for over 48 minutes of music by Daniel Pellicer. Also includes the Official 8-page Comic by Juanito Medina (Loloxomoxo).
